TopicTitle: TiberDyne Advanced SAS - Tuned Edition v0.2a

Articles.Content:
Here you will find some 1 meter SAS modules, tuned to be better for a certain size of rocket - from small single stages and planes, to massive skyscrapers built out of boosters.

Uses the default ASAS module with some color bands, if anyone wants to make some 1, 2 or 3 meter models I would certain use them

Lots of credit goes to foamyesque for the basic scaling of the numbers to make them work with various sizes of ships.

Usage note: Adding more than one ASAS module per ship is generally bad. Its better to move up to the next 'size' if you get a constantly full meter and control 'jitter' - If you build a ship that still jitters using the Massive module, post a screen so we can see how big it is.

Keep in mind this is still an alpha release, the more people that test it with their various contraptions, the better
